attributes.action: Suspend Royal Mail delivery of D 2 D advertising mail.
attributes.additional_details: Because the Royal Mail are not providing adequate PPE for their staff, leaving them vulnerable and potentially exposed to the virus and with the added potential of contributing to its spread.
attributes.background: Stop D 2D advertising mail for the duration of the Covid 19 crisis, thus avoiding unnecessary visits to households by postal workers.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for Royal Mail, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308690
